p: Descriptive and inferential statistics of kinematics parameters are reported in Table 2 (TTO) and Table 3 (TER). The analysis of variance for the TTO group highlighted statistical differences for VAP, VCL, VSL, DAP, DCL, DSL, and STR; on the other hand, only VSL, DSL, LIN, and STR resulted statistically altered for the TER group.
